page.title: 16TECHNICAL INDUSTRIES.
page.content: BROWN AND SHARPE TOOK OVER MELBOURNE ENGINEERING IN 1981.THE ORIGINAL COMPANY WAS FOUNDED IN 1931 TO REPAIR CARS FROM THE DONINGTON RACE TRACK. IT REPAIRED MUNITIONS MACHINERY IN THE WAR BUT NOW BUILDS NEW SINGLE SPINDLE MACHINERY AND RECONDITIONS OLD MACHINES.THEY EMPLOY 200 WORKERS. DATAPATH LTD. MAKES COMPUTER GRAPHIC TERMINALS WHICH ARE USED IN COMPUTER- AIDED DESIGN.IT IS BASED IN MELBOURNE BECAUSE OF ITS PROXIMITY TO THE M1 MOTORWAY AND EAST MIDLANDS AIRPORT.IN 1984 85% OF SALES WERE IN THE U.K.,10% IN EUROPE AND 5% IN THE REST OF THE WORLD.INDUSTRIAL MEASUREMENTS LTD. MAKES TORQUE MEASURING EQUIPMENT WHICH MEASURES POWER OUTPUT OF BIG ENGINES LIKE HELICOPTERS,AIRCRAFT CARRIERS AND WINDMILLS.9 PEOPLE WORK THERE AND 40% OF PRODUCTION IS FOR EXPORT.THE M1 AND AIRPORT EASE THE CARRYING OF EXPORTS.
